titles.title: Timber Tax Simplification Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide capital gain treatment under section 631(b) of such Code for outright sales of timber by landowners.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/27/2003--Introduced. Timber Tax Simplification Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the application of capital gain treatment to outright sales of timber whether or not the owner retains economic interest.
